answers.answer: Hello,It is important to rule out any kidney stones and inflammation of the kidneys as well. Patients with urinary calculi may report pain, infection, or hematuria. I suggest you to get an ultrasound or CT abdomen and a thorough examination, a complete urine examination and a urine culture done from a urologist. If kidney and urinary causes are ruled out then GI causes and other causes like diabetes should be investigated.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

question: When I turn over and lie on my right side I have Pain above and to the right of my bell button. This makes me feel as if something is pushing and then makes me feel as if I need a wee!! It is getting very frustrating.
title: Urge to wee
